name: Iknow
slogan: Iknow is an application of encounters and knowledge
description:
Intermediary system in charge of entertaining the two conversationalists through nice questions with the aim of stipulating a real meeting in a partner activity (restaurants, cinema, market) in short, all the activities that have economic ends and are places of entertainment.
Well, the world needs it because the applications of meetings and the current knowledge are qualitatively scarce, they cannot establish a meeting between two conversationalists, and this does not say simply my personal experience, but also market research.
Iknow, with questions such as: "send your socks" makes the conversation of the two conversationalists much more exciting, which makes the final meeting more likely.

team.name: Amin Naghmouchi
team.bioHtml:
Founder of Iknow.
Philosophy, Economics, Innovation.

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.description:
I'm looking for a developer (CO-FOUNDER) in London who wants to collaborate voluntarily with me to create "Iknow".
I'm not necessarily looking for a specialized programmer, even a fan of this branch is fine.
The important thing is that he understands the sector in which he operates.
for any information, contact me in private or by email.
amin.naghmouchi2@gmail.com
